document_title: Local Authorities (Public Health Functions and Entry to Premises by Local Healthwatch Representatives) Regulations 2013

duties.duty_description: Weigh and measure children aged 4-5 and 10-11 years
Offer health checks to eligible persons aged 40-74 years
Ensure continuous improvement in health check participation
Provide open access sexual health services
Provide public health advice to clinical commissioning groups
Provide information and advice on health protection arrangements
Make and recover charges for certain public health functions
Allow entry and observation by Local Healthwatch representatives
